divs: sighting detailson 11\04\2012 at approximately 5:00 a.m., i seen an oval looking craft with orange looking light emission. it was traveling from west to east at about a 45 degree horizon, and it was moving at a very high rate of speed. the sighting was in schererville, indiana.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Schererville
There were no other sightings in Schererville on or around November 4th 2012
Summary: Oval looking craft. Orange looking light emission.
